mapper.insert:

INSERT INTO biz_calc_exec_data ( id, process_id, rate_id, date_index, date_index_end, day_rate, day_amount,days,year_rate,ip ) VALUES

mapper.select: SELECT min(a.date_index) AS startDate, max(a.date_index) AS endDate, round(a.year_rate ,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id ORDER BY a.date_index

SELECT min(a.date_index) startDate, max(a.date_index) endDate, round(a.year_rate,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ,day_rate ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id , a.day_rate ORDER BY b.start_date

SELECT min(a.date_index) startDate, max(a.date_index) endDate, round(a.day_rate*100,5) suiteRate, c.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,rate_id,day_rate FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ,day_rate ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND a.rate_id = c.rate_id and a.day_rate = c.day_rate WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id , a.day_rate ORDER BY b.start_date

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m') startDate, '' endDate, round(a.year_rate,5) suiteRate, case a.is_full when 1 then 1 else concat(a.days,'/',a.full_days) end AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount, a.days days FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT process_id ,COUNT(1) days,DATE_FORMAT( date_index,'%Y-%m') monthIndex FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_index,'%Y-%m') ) c ON a.process_id = c.process_id AND DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m') = c.monthIndex WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y-%m')

SELECT c.startDate startDate, c.endDate endDate, ROUND(a.year_rate,5) suiteRate, c.days days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT rate_id, process_id ,COUNT(1) days,MIN(date_index) startDate,MAX(date_index) endDate FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY rate_id ) c ON a.rate_id = c.rate_id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY a.rate_id ORDER BY a.date_index

SELECT concat(a.date_index,'至',a.date_index_end) startDate, '' endDate, round(a.year_rate,5) suiteRate, a.days AS days, ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) AS sectionAmount, a.days days FROM biz_calc_exec_data a LEFT JOIN biz_calc_interest_rate_data b ON a.rate_id = b.id WHERE a.process_id = #{processId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.date_index,'%Y')
SELECT ROUND(SUM(day_amount),2) FROM biz_calc_exec_data WHERE process_id = #{processId}
